name: Antisocial media
description:
Me and a classmate made this game in 4 weeks based on a poem written by a fellow student as part of the "Interactive Emotion" project brief at ELAM. Can you escape the depths of social media? (This game uses spacial audio; headphones recommended :))

Please fill in this quick feedback survey after you play: https://forms.gle/zMW2KRqQXJSTzGAUA

Controls

W & S / up & down arrows  -  forwards & backwards

A & D / left & right arrows - turn left & right

[space] - upload post
